body.name: Mounting Dream TV Wall Mount for Most 37-70 Inch Flat Screen TV Tilting, Low Profile Space Saving Wall Mount for 16",18",24" Stud, UL Listed TV Mount Bracket for Max VESA 600 x 400, 132lbs MD2868-LK

features: [Universal TV Mount]: Ul listed Heavy duty TV wall mounts fits most 37"-70" flat screen or curved TVs with weight up to 132lbs, 60 in kgs. Generally, common 37,40,42,43,46,48,49,50,55,60,65,70 inches, OLED/LCD/LED/Plasma TVs are all covered, of major TV/Monitor brands like Samsung/LG/TCL/Sony/Vizio/Hisense/Toshiba etc. VESA wall mount works for VESA mounting pattern ranging from 200x100mm to 600x400mm. Extra wide TV mounting bracket with 24-inch wall plate, is compatible with 16”, 18”, 24” wood stud, concrete/brick wall as well (Note: dry wall alone excluded).

[Tilt TV Wall Mount]: Adjustable angled TV mount can be freely tilted by max 8 degree, to reduce screen reflection glare and neck/eye strain for better comfortable viewing. When the brackets are at 0°, this flat TV mount surely creates a sleek look. Search MD2163-K for the no tilt version flush wall mount.

[Low Profile Wall Mount for TV]: Slim TV wall mount keeps TV just 1.5’’ flush profile against wall, very much of streamlined and tidy looking, easy to blend in with any decor. Mounting TV over a TV stand, this TV wall bracket is greatly saving space for consoles on entertainment center.

[Simple TV hanger]: Major TV mounting hardware kits are included in the TV bracket package, like multi-size TV screws, spacers and washers. (Note: Concrete anchors will be sent separately per request.) A mounting template and bubble level will help to make things easy. With a detailed instruction, finish installing this wall mount bracket in less than 30 minutes.

[Responsive Customer Service]: US based customer support is 7 days a week online to cover your pre-purchase and installation questions about the TV wall mount. If you have any concerns, let us know anytime. Please check the VESA pattern, TV weight, wall stud before purchasing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With more than 30 years of production and design, Mounting Dream is dedicated to quality and affordable TV accessories. Every mount is designed to make your device safe & flexible for better viewing experience.
Previous page Next page 1 Tilting Adjustment 2 Easy Cable Access 3 Lock & Release 4 Heavy-Duty Steel

TV compatible Fits most 37 to 70 inch flat LED OLED QLEKD 4K TVs weight up to 132lbs / 60kg VESA/TV Hole Pattern 200x100mm, 200x200mm, 300x200mm, 200x300mm, 300x300mm, 400x200mm, 400x300mm, 400x400mm, 500x300mm, 600x400mm. Adjustable Viewing 8° tilting (maximum angle depending on TV size) Save Space Low profile 1.5" Wall type This TV wall mount fits for wood studs or concrete wall installation only, not for drywall. Anchors will be sent per requested. Package Included Wall plate unit, User Manual, Hardware Pack, Bubble level (x1). The concrete anchors for concrete/brick wall installation are not included in package to avoid any misuse. Note The package includes M6 and M8 TV screws. Please let us know if you need M4 TV screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, sturdy mount for the price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Instructions were ready to follow and all the necessary hardware was included. I was able to get my TV mounted quickly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a sturdy, quality TV mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mount. It was very simple to install, even came with its own level. My only gripe was that I messed up the phillips slots in one of the bolts because my bit jumped. It wasn't until later my dumb a** realized the bolts may be phillips, but also have standard hex head shape so I could have just put a socket driver on my drill lol. So I'd strong suggest you do that rather than try to drive the bolts into your studs with a phillips attachment.I really like the two pull string release mechanism. The only other wall mount I worked with before had allen bolts that would snug up to hold the TV secure. This is SO much easier to release. I don't like that the cords hang below the level of the TV, but that was remedied with a "command hook" mounted center and a coupe inches up from the bottom of the TV. I just pull the cords up and loop them over the hook. Voila, no more visible cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good bracket for a TV from 40 to 55"
reviews.reviewText: The item came disassembled in a box that is about 60% smaller than the assembled bracket. You have to put together the two wings of the bracket by connecting one wing to a flat fitting with the supplied screws. The package comes also with two long clips with pivoted upper hooks that would be screwed to the back of the TV. Installation was straightforward, since the kit includes a mounting template made of card which was a bit flimsy but was nevertheless good help. Mounting the clips to the TV is relatively easy: I removed the temporary screws from mine and chose appropriate screws included in the package, which comes with sets of mounting screws to fit most TVs, plus spacers in case the appropriate screws are too long, or if you need to space the clips and the TV so that the TV itself does not hit the wall.Overall the bracket is doing the job of holding my 55" flat TV on the wall. I can't verify it would hold a bigger size TV but I don't see why not, provided you mount the bracket to wall studs on both sides with the 4 provided stud bolts. I recommend you drill pilot holes first with a small diameter bit before you drill the bigger holes needed for the bolts with a bigger size bit. You want the hole to be slightly smaller than the threads (but not too small), so that the threads have something to bite but not so small that the wood expands or it is difficult to turn the bolt.
